AI Description: Exonerate is a versatile tool for sequence alignment and homology search. It is widely used for comparison of protein and nucleotide sequences against a wide range of genomic databases.
Core Features: Flexible Sequence Alignment & Homology Search Algorithms, Support For Protein-Protein, DNA-DNA, Protein-DNA, & Est-Genome Alignments, Ability To Handle Large Genomic Datasets Efficiently, Customizable Scoring Parameters For Alignment, Output In Various Formats For Downstream Analysis
General Tags: Sequence Alignment, Homology Search, Bioinformatics, Genomics
